experiences: Developed a logistics web application for deployed military units that optimized supply routes based on multiple factors, reducing resource location time by 90% and boosting replenishment efficiency by 80%.

Designed and deployed a scalable RESTful API with Django Rest Framework, managed real-time logistics data using MySQL, and ensured reliable cloud performance and security via AWS Elastic Beanstalk and EC2, all integrated into a responsive frontend for intuitive field use.
Resolved 100+ server and user issues onsite and remotely, ensuring system efficiency and productivity.
Set up workstations, imaged devices, and configured print servers to support 100+ users, streamlining workflow.
